stepTitle: What Mass of sodium hydroxide, NaOH, would be required to produce $$16$$ g of the antacid milk of magnesia [magnesium hydroxide, $$\operatorname{Mg}\left(OH\right) _2$$ ] by the following reaction: $$\text{MgCl}_2\text{(aq)}+2\text{NaOH}\text{(aq)}\rightarrow\text{Mg(OH)}_2\text{(s)}+2\text{NaCl}\text{(aq)}?$$ Give your answer as an integer.
stepBody: Please round to the nearest whole number.
